text: I think I've mentioned this before, but swapping out all HubSpot forms `<input type="submit" value="Send">` with a button `<button type="submit">Send</button>` would be nice
allows for pseudo before/afters for things like icons n' such without having to use background images like we do now

:+1: thanks for the feedback, Stefen! It's a tricky move to make given that we need to keep support for all the existing forms out there and the CSS targeting them, but updates like this are something we're looking to get better at, and get a little better and rollout plans
